snippet: The long-running dispute between the railroad and its unions carries echoes of the last time workers walked out, but the gap between the two sides is much smaller this time around.
abstract: Long-running dispute between Long Island Rail Road and its unions, which could lead to strike, carries echoes of 1994, last time when workers walked out; gap between two sides is actually much smaller in current dispute.
lead_paragraph: The long-running dispute between the railroad and its unions carries echoes of the last time workers walked out, but the gap between the two sides is much smaller this time around.

headline.main: As Strike Threat Looms, Stalled L.I.R.R. Talks Carry Hint of the Past
headline.print_headline: As Strike Threat Looms, Stalled L.I.R.R. Talks Carry Hint of the Past
